name: Themereps Helper
author: ThemeReps

sections.description:
Themereps Helper is a companion plugin for Themereps Themes, which provides core functionality and extends free and premium themes features. The plugin requires the Advanced Import : One Click Import for WordPress or Theme Demo Data plugin to be installed for demo data importing in just a click.

How to use this Themereps Helper?

  1. While installing free or premium themes by themereps do kindly install & activate the plugin “Themereps Helper”
  2. The plugin requires the Advanced Import : One Click Import for WordPress or Theme Demo Data plugin to be installed to demo data import. So install and active it.
  3. To import demo contents, please go to Appearance > Demo Import.
  4. Choose your demo by checking live preview and then click import button to import the demo.
  5. Feel free to contact themereps support team at ( https://themereps.com/contact/ ) if you need any assistance.
sections.installation:
You can install Themereps Helper Plugins as following two ways:
1. Upload zip file from Dashboard->Plugin->Add New “upload plugin” or
2. Extract Themereps Helper and placed it to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
– Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is Themereps Helper is a free plugin?

Yes, it is a free plugin.

Does this plugin works with any WordPress theme

No, This plugin will only work with the themes developed by Themereps.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 – 10 October, 2023

  • Adding demo for “Kunty” Theme
  • Fixing some minor issue for custom widgets
  • Support for child theme

1.0.3

  • Social icons issue fixed

1.0.1

  • Pricing metabox issue fixed
  • Social icons are integrated as font icon

1.0.0

  • Initial Realese
